price: 84 Leurs richesses et leurs forteresses ne leur furent d’aucune utilité.
arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
